stories.text:
Hey! I'm building a privacy focused and minimalist LinkedIn alternative for engineers: - Only connections can message you - Find your next role on your terms, no recruiter spam - Being a connection and following Activity is decoupled - Privacy focused and open source, no Google Analytics

Would this be interesting to the community? Let me know your thoughts!
stories.title: Ask HN: A minimalist LinkedIn alternative for engineers?
